title: Tester Result
description: Schema for tester.result.json produced by the tester subagent

status.description: passed if all tests passed; failed if tests failed; error if test run could not complete

run-id.description: The run id from context (if available)

summary.description: Brief summary of the test run

command.description: The test command that was run

exit-code.description: Exit code of the test command

output.description: Captured stdout from the test run (abbreviated if long)

failures.description: List of failed tests or failure details
